comments.body:
Honestly, shouldn't have opted for the post option. They are infamously slow at posting your PDC. As with all things related to the COE, it is significantly faster to handle issues/requests in person. Many people in my batch who were posted in different cities had their friends in Bangalore collect the PDC on their behalf, scan it, and send a copy within the same day, so they could share it with their employer and then post it to them over the next few days. 

If you are in the city - go pay them a visit and sort it out. Else, send a proxy. Either way, unless you make a visit they will not speed things along.
So in ec campus , there is a person(pavithra) you can contact  for.  I think if your from rr someone might be there to contact.

Go in person and ask. If you send someone else you will need to fill another form.   
I think they take 1 week minimum irrespective
convince employer vs force PESU. pick one
